Class MainController

java.lang.Object
tkshehan.c482software1.controller.MainController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class MainController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This class controls the main view of the application.

    • deletePart

      public void deletePart(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This method deletes a selected part from the inventory, after confirmation. The part must not be used in any products.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - An action from the user.
